tosdr.case: User accounts can be terminated after having been in breach of the terms of service repeatedly

title: User accounts can be terminated after having been in breach of the terms of service repeatedly
quoteText: To prevent bad actors from creating a negative community experience, we have outlined what we believe to be common sense rules for community participation and reserve the right to pause or terminate your account if you engage in disruptive, abusive, or nefarious behavior outside of Stack Overflowâ€™s Acceptable Use Policy, which is hereby incorporated into these Public Network Terms.
